channel.title: How do I make my server a no-ip?
channel.description: I have done Mod Taharoks guide for Port Forwarding, but it didn't work.. So now, I need help with Port Forward becouse I can't. I got the D-Link router, but I don't got the "gaming" button, I have visual server and I need help on how to Port Forward there! I already have a no-ip but I am playing on Hamatchi. So when I am done with Port Forward I (hope) will be able to play on a no-ip.. Hope you can help me with the Port Forward part.. If you do so I can use my no-ip, I will make you co-owner of my server (hurray?), hope you understund what I wrote.. ---------------------------------------------------- Short Explanation: 1. I need help with Port Forwarding a D-Link router. 2. I don't got the "gaming" button, but I got "visual server". 3. I need help to Port Forward it. 4. The one that makes me to get a No-Ip will get co-owner of my server.

item.title: How do I make my server a no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @texis11 texis11
item.description:
@texis11 wrote:

You know that if you read the post you will find that I have already read Mod Taharoks guide, and all the other Port Forwarding guides, none works[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 12:39:22 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? Please only answer if you have the real answer or a question…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make my server a no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @texis11 texis11
item.description:
@texis11 wrote:

I have done Mod Taharoks guide for Port Forwarding, but it didn’t work… So now, I need help with Port Forward becouse I can’t. I got the D-Link router, but I don’t got the “gaming” button, I have visual server and I need help on how to Port Forward there! I already have a no-ip but I am playing on Hamatchi. So when I am done with Port Forward I (hope) will be able to play on a no-ip… Hope you can help me with the Port Forward part… If you do so I can use my no-ip, I will make you co-owner of my server (hurray?), hope you understund what I wrote…

Short Explanation:

  1. I need help with Port Forwarding a D-Link router.
  2. I don’t got the “gaming” button, but I got “visual server”.
  3. I need help to Port Forward it.
  4. The one that makes me to get a No-Ip will get co-owner of my server.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my server a no-ip?
